title: Typical VooDoo game
text:
Great idea. Under developed (mastered in an hour, not enough levels, etc), and waaaaaaasay too many ads. 

Wish they would get some new leadership and change their approach to games. They‚Äôre knocking on the door of great success. I keep answering but inevitably ask them to leave immediately. 

This game was ok for 24 hours.

title: Bad Update
text: I really like the game but the new update shows an ad as you cross from section to section. When you come back from the ad your person continues to walk in the direction it was going and disables the controls which causes you to fall. Got to correct this if you want this to succeed. Great game, bad update.

title: We NEED zero ads in this game!!!!!!

title: The game WAS addicting
text: The game itself is fun. I didn‚Äôt mind watching ads in between levels. Then the devs lost their minds and made you watch 2-3 ads within each level. When you get to the harder levels, and ads end up freezing you out the game, only to have to start back at lower levels, well that earns you one star. Probably going to delete this one soon, great game, but greedy devs killed it.

title: Too many ads

Literally in the middle of the gameplay and an ad will randomly start. Really gets annoying and makes the game less fun. I expect and don‚Äôt mind an ad between every level but unless the ads during game play stop I‚Äôll be quickly deleting this app.

title: Ugh
text:
I‚Äôve had this game for about a month now... at first all was good n then... about twice in the MIDDLE of the game... a stupid add that I‚Äôve seen PLENTY of times would pop up n then sometimes it would screw up the progress I‚Äôve made in the game... I got tired of it happening SO much that I just deleted it off my phone. It‚Äôs very aggravating to happen in the middle of the game... 
2 stars for the simple fact that every match is pretty much the same... it‚Äôs not challenging but kinda fun... n then because of the pop up ads.
